02264           *out << "RB Sender Local ID" << endl;
02265           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02266           *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02267           *out << (*pos)->hltLocalId_ << endl;
02268           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02269         *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02270         *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02271           *out << "<td >" << endl;
02272           *out << "RB Sender Tid" << endl;
02273           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02274           *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02275           *out << (*pos)->hltTid_ << endl;
02276           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02277         *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02278         *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02279           *out << "<td >" << endl;
02280           *out << "FU Sender id (shared memory id!)" << endl;
02281           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02282           *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02283           *out << (*pos)->rbBufferID_ << endl;
02284           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02285         *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02286         *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02287           *out << "<td >" << endl;
02288           *out << "Number of registries received (output modules)" << endl;
02289           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02290           *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02291           *out << (*pos)->registryCollection_.outModName_.size() << endl;
02292           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02293         *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02294         *out << "<tr><td bgcolor=\"#999933\" height=\"1\" colspan=\"2\"></td></tr>" << endl;
02295         // Loop over number of registries
02296         if(!(*pos)->registryCollection_.outModName_.empty()) {
02297           for(vector<std::string>::iterator idx = (*pos)->registryCollection_.outModName_.begin();
02298               idx != (*pos)->registryCollection_.outModName_.end(); ++idx)
02299           {
02300             *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02301               *out << "<td >" << endl;
02302               *out << "Output Module Name" << endl;
02303               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02304               *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02305               *out << (*idx) << endl;
02306               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02307             *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02308             *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02309               *out << "<td >" << endl;
02310               *out << "Output Module Id" << endl;
02311               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02312               *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02313               *out << (*pos)->registryCollection_.outModName2ModId_[*idx] << endl;
02314               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02315             *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02316             *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02317               *out << "<td >" << endl;
02318               *out << "Product registry size (bytes)" << endl;
02319               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02320               *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02321               *out << (*pos)->registryCollection_.registrySizeMap_[*idx] << endl;
02322               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02323             *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02324             *out << "<tr><td bgcolor=\"#999933\" height=\"1\" colspan=\"2\"></td></tr>" << endl;
02325           }
02326         }
02327         *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02328           *out << "<td>" << endl;
02329           *out << "Connection Status" << endl;
02330           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02331           *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02332           *out << (*pos)->connectStatus_ << endl;
02333           *out << "</td>" << endl;
02334         *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02335         if((*pos)->connectStatus_ > 1) {
02336           *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02337             *out << "<td >" << endl;
02338             *out << "Time since last data frame (ms)" << endl;
02339             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02340             *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02341             *out << (*pos)->timeWaited_ << endl;
02342             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02343           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02344           *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02345             *out << "<td >" << endl;
02346             *out << "Run number" << endl;
02347             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02348             *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02349             *out << (*pos)->runNumber_ << endl;
02350             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02351           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02352           *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02353             *out << "<td >" << endl;
02354             *out << "Running locally" << endl;
02355             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02356             *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02357             if((*pos)->isLocal_) {
02358               *out << "Yes" << endl;
02359             } else {
02360               *out << "No" << endl;
02361             }
02362             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02363           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02364           *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02365             *out << "<td >" << endl;
02366             *out << "Frames received" << endl;
02367             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02368             *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02369             *out << (*pos)->framesReceived_ << endl;
02370             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02371           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02372           *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02373             *out << "<td >" << endl;
02374             *out << "Events received" << endl;
02375             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02376             *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02377             *out << (*pos)->eventsReceived_ << endl;
02378             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02379           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02380           *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02381             *out << "<td >" << endl;
02382             *out << "Total Bytes received" << endl;
02383             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02384             *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02385             *out << (*pos)->totalSizeReceived_ << endl;
02386             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02387           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02388           *out << "<tr><td bgcolor=\"#999933\" height=\"1\" colspan=\"2\"></td></tr>" << endl;
02389           // Loop over number of output modules
02390           if(!(*pos)->registryCollection_.outModName_.empty()) {
02391             for(vector<std::string>::iterator idx = (*pos)->registryCollection_.outModName_.begin();
02392                 idx != (*pos)->registryCollection_.outModName_.end(); ++idx)
02393             {
02394               *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02395                 *out << "<td >" << endl;
02396                 *out << "Output Module Name" << endl;
02397                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02398                 *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02399                 *out << (*idx) << endl;
02400                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02401               *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02402               *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02403                 *out << "<td >" << endl;
02404                 *out << "Frames received" << endl;
02405                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02406                 *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02407                 *out << (*pos)->datCollection_.framesReceivedMap_[*idx] << endl;
02408                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02409               *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02410               *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02411                 *out << "<td >" << endl;
02412                 *out << "Events received" << endl;
02413                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02414                 *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02415                 *out << (*pos)->datCollection_.eventsReceivedMap_[*idx] << endl;
02416                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02417               *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02418               *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02419                 *out << "<td >" << endl;
02420                 *out << "Total Bytes received" << endl;
02421                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02422                 *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02423                 *out << (*pos)->datCollection_.totalSizeReceivedMap_[*idx] << endl;
02424                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02425               *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02426               *out << "<tr><td bgcolor=\"#999933\" height=\"1\" colspan=\"2\"></td></tr>" << endl;
02427             }
02428           }
02429           if((*pos)->eventsReceived_ > 0) {
02430             *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02431               *out << "<td >" << endl;
02432               *out << "Last frame latency (us)" << endl;
02433               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02434               *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02435               *out << (*pos)->lastLatency_ << endl;
02436               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02437             *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02438             *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02439               *out << "<td >" << endl;
02440               *out << "Average event size (Bytes)" << endl;
02441               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02442               *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02443               *out << (*pos)->totalSizeReceived_/(*pos)->eventsReceived_ << endl;
02444               *out << "</td>" << endl;
02445               *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02446                 *out << "<td >" << endl;
02447                 *out << "Last Run Number" << endl;
02448                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02449                 *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02450                 *out << (*pos)->lastRunID_ << endl;
02451                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02452               *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02453               *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02454                 *out << "<td >" << endl;
02455                 *out << "Last Event Number" << endl;
02456                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02457                 *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02458                 *out << (*pos)->lastEventID_ << endl;
02459                 *out << "</td>" << endl;
02460               *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02461             } // events received endif
02462           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02463           *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02464             *out << "<td >" << endl;
02465             *out << "Total out of order frames" << endl;
02466             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02467             *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02468             *out << (*pos)->totalOutOfOrder_ << endl;
02469             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02470           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02471           *out << "<tr>" << endl;
02472             *out << "<td >" << endl;
02473             *out << "Total Bad Events" << endl;
02474             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02475             *out << "<td align=right>" << endl;
02476             *out << (*pos)->totalBadEvents_ << endl;
02477             *out << "</td>" << endl;
02478           *out << "  </tr>" << endl;
02479         } // connect status endif
02480       } // Sender list loop
02481     } //sender size test endif
02482 
02483   *out << "</table>" << endl;
02484 
02485   *out << "  </td>"                                                  << endl;
02486   *out << "</table>"                                                 << endl;
02487 
02488   *out << "</body>"                                                  << endl;
02489   *out << "</html>"                                                  << endl;
02490 }
02491 
02492 
02494 void StorageManager::streamerOutputWebPage(xgi::Input *in, xgi::Output *out)
02495   throw (xgi::exception::Exception)
02496 {
02497   *out << "<html>"                                                   << endl;
02498   *out << "<head>"                                                   << endl;
02499   *out << "<link type=\"text/css\" rel=\"stylesheet\"";
02500   *out << " href=\"/" <<  getApplicationDescriptor()->getURN()
02501        << "/styles.css\"/>"                   << endl;
02502   *out << "<title>" << getApplicationDescriptor()->getClassName() << " instance "
02503        << getApplicationDescriptor()->getInstance()
02504        << "</title>"     << endl;
02505   *out << "</head><body>"                                            << endl;
02506     *out << "<table border=\"0\" width=\"100%\">"                      << endl;
02507     *out << "<tr>"                                                     << endl;
02508     *out << "  <td align=\"left\">"                                    << endl;
02509     *out << "    <img"                                                 << endl;
02510     *out << "     align=\"middle\""                                    << endl;
02511     *out << "     src=\"/rubuilder/fu/images/fu64x64.gif\""     << endl;
02512     *out << "     alt=\"main\""                                        << endl;
02513     *out << "     width=\"64\""                                        << endl;
02514     *out << "     height=\"64\""                                       << endl;
02515     *out << "     border=\"\"/>"                                       << endl;
02516     *out << "    <b>"                                                  << endl;
02517     *out << getApplicationDescriptor()->getClassName() << " instance "
02518          << getApplicationDescriptor()->getInstance()                  << endl;
02519     *out << "      " << fsm_.stateName()->toString()                   << endl;
02520     *out << "    </b>"                                                 << endl;
02521     *out << "  </td>"                                                  << endl;
02522     *out << "  <td width=\"32\">"                                      << endl;
02523     *out << "    <a href=\"/urn:xdaq-application:lid=3\">"             << endl;
02524     *out << "      <img"                                               << endl;
02525     *out << "       align=\"middle\""                                  << endl;
02526     *out << "       src=\"/hyperdaq/images/HyperDAQ.jpg\""    << endl;
02527     *out << "       alt=\"HyperDAQ\""                                  << endl;
02528     *out << "       width=\"32\""                                      << endl;
02529     *out << "       height=\"32\""                                      << endl;
02530     *out << "       border=\"\"/>"                                     << endl;
02531     *out << "    </a>"                                                 << endl;
02532     *out << "  </td>"                                                  << endl;
02533     *out << "  <td width=\"32\">"                                      << endl;
02534     *out << "  </td>"                                                  << endl;
02535     *out << "  <td width=\"32\">"                                      << endl;
02536     *out << "    <a href=\"/" << getApplicationDescriptor()->getURN()
02537          << "/debug\">"                   << endl;
02538     *out << "      <img"                                               << endl;
02539     *out << "       align=\"middle\""                                  << endl;
02540     *out << "       src=\"/rubuilder/fu/images/debug32x32.gif\""       << endl;
02541     *out << "       alt=\"debug\""                                     << endl;
02542     *out << "       width=\"32\""                                      << endl;
02543     *out << "       height=\"32\""                                     << endl;
02544     *out << "       border=\"\"/>"                                     << endl;
02545     *out << "    </a>"                                                 << endl;
02546     *out << "  </td>"                                                  << endl;
02547     *out << "</tr>"                                                    << endl;
02548     if(fsm_.stateName()->value_ == "Failed")
02549     {
02550       *out << "<tr>"               << endl;
02551       *out << " <td>"              << endl;
02552       *out << "<textarea rows=" << 5 << " cols=60 scroll=yes";
02553       *out << " readonly title=\"Reason For Failed\">"         << endl;
02554       *out << reasonForFailedState_                                  << endl;
02555       *out << "</textarea>"                                          << endl;
02556       *out << " </td>"               << endl;
02557       *out << "</tr>"              << endl;
02558     }
02559     *out << "</table>"                                                 << endl;
02560 
02561     *out << "<hr/>"                                                    << endl;
02562 
02563     // should first test if jc_ is valid
02564     if(jc_.get() != NULL && jc_->getInitMsgCollection().get() != NULL &&
02565        jc_->getInitMsgCollection()->size() > 0) {
02566       boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(halt_lock_);
02567       if(jc_.use_count() != 0) {
02568         std::list<std::string>& files = jc_->get_filelist();
02569         if(files.size() > 0 )
02570           {
02571             if(files.size() > 249 )
02572               *out << "<P>250 last files (most recent first):</P>\n" << endl;
02573             else 
02574               *out << "<P>Files (most recent first):</P>\n" << endl;
02575             *out << "<pre># pathname nevts size" << endl;
02576             int c=0;
02577             for(list<string>::reverse_iterator it = files.rbegin(); it != files.rend(); ++it) {
02578               *out <<*it << endl;
02579               ++c;
02580               if(c>249) break;
02581             }
02582           }
02583       }
02584     }
02585 
02586   *out << "</body>"                                                  << endl;
02587   *out << "</html>"                                                  << endl;
02588 }
02589 
02590 
02592 void StorageManager::eventdataWebPage(xgi::Input *in, xgi::Output *out)
02593   throw (xgi::exception::Exception)
02594 {
02595   // default the message length to zero
02596   int len=0;
02597 
02598   // determine the consumer ID from the event request
02599   // message, if it is available.
02600   unsigned int consumerId = 0;
02601   int consumerInitMsgCount = -1;
02602   std::string lengthString = in->getenv("CONTENT_LENGTH");
02603   unsigned long contentLength = std::atol(lengthString.c_str());
02604   if (contentLength > 0) 
02605     {
02606       auto_ptr< vector<char> > bufPtr(new vector<char>(contentLength));
02607       in->read(&(*bufPtr)[0], contentLength);
02608       OtherMessageView requestMessage(&(*bufPtr)[0]);
02609       if (requestMessage.code() == Header::EVENT_REQUEST)
02610   {
02611     uint8 *bodyPtr = requestMessage.msgBody();
02612     consumerId = convert32(bodyPtr);
02613           if (requestMessage.bodySize() >= (2 * sizeof(char_uint32)))
02614             {
02615               bodyPtr += sizeof(char_uint32);
02616               consumerInitMsgCount = convert32(bodyPtr);
02617             }
02618   }
02619     }
02620 
02621   // first test if StorageManager is in Enabled state and registry is filled
02622   // this must be the case for valid data to be present
02623   if(fsm_.stateName()->toString() == "Enabled" && jc_.get() != NULL &&
02624      jc_->getInitMsgCollection().get() != NULL &&
02625      jc_->getInitMsgCollection()->size() > 0)
02626   {
02627     boost::shared_ptr<EventServer> eventServer = jc_->getEventServer();
02628     if (eventServer.get() != NULL)
02629     {
02630       // if we've stored a "registry warning" in the consumer pipe, send
02631       // that instead of an event so that the consumer can react to
02632       // the warning
02633       boost::shared_ptr<ConsumerPipe> consPtr =
02634         eventServer->getConsumer(consumerId);
02635       if (consPtr.get() != NULL && consPtr->hasRegistryWarning())
02636       {
02637         std::vector<char> registryWarning = consPtr->getRegistryWarning();
02638         const char* from = &registryWarning[0];
02639         unsigned int msize = registryWarning.size();
02640         if(mybuffer_.capacity() < msize) mybuffer_.resize(msize);
02641         unsigned char* pos = (unsigned char*) &mybuffer_[0];
02642 
02643         copy(from,from+msize,pos);
02644         len = msize;
02645         consPtr->clearRegistryWarning();
02646       }
02647       // if the consumer is an instance of the proxy server and
02648       // it knows about fewer INIT messages than we do, tell it
02649       // that new INIT message(s) are available
02650       else if (consPtr.get() != NULL && consPtr->isProxyServer() &&
02651                consumerInitMsgCount >= 0 &&
02652                jc_->getInitMsgCollection()->size() > consumerInitMsgCount)
02653       {
02654         OtherMessageBuilder othermsg(&mybuffer_[0],
02655                                      Header::NEW_INIT_AVAILABLE);
02656         len = othermsg.size();
02657       }
02658       // otherwise try to send an event
02659       else
02660       {
02661         boost::shared_ptr< std::vector<char> > bufPtr =
02662           eventServer->getEvent(consumerId);
02663         if (bufPtr.get() != NULL)
02664         {
02665           EventMsgView msgView(&(*bufPtr)[0]);
02666 
02667           unsigned char* from = msgView.startAddress();
02668           unsigned int dsize = msgView.size();
02669           if(mybuffer_.capacity() < dsize) mybuffer_.resize(dsize);
02670           unsigned char* pos = (unsigned char*) &mybuffer_[0];
02671 
02672           copy(from,from+dsize,pos);
02673           len = dsize;
02674           FDEBUG(10) << "sending event " << msgView.event() << std::endl;
02675         }
02676       }
02677     }
02678     
02679     out->getHTTPResponseHeader().addHeader("Content-Type", "application/octet-stream");
02680     out->getHTTPResponseHeader().addHeader("Content-Transfer-Encoding", "binary");
02681     out->write((char*) &mybuffer_[0],len);
02682   } // else send end of run as reponse
02683   else
02684     {
02685       OtherMessageBuilder othermsg(&mybuffer_[0],Header::DONE);
02686       len = othermsg.size();
02687       //std::cout << "making other message code = " << othermsg.code()
02688       //          << " and size = " << othermsg.size() << std::endl;
02689       
02690       out->getHTTPResponseHeader().addHeader("Content-Type", "application/octet-stream");
02691       out->getHTTPResponseHeader().addHeader("Content-Transfer-Encoding", "binary");
02692       out->write((char*) &mybuffer_[0],len);
02693     }
02694   
02695   // How to block if there is no data
02696   // How to signal if end, and there will be no more data?
02697   
02698 }
02699 
02700 
02702 void StorageManager::headerdataWebPage(xgi::Input *in, xgi::Output *out)
02703   throw (xgi::exception::Exception)
02704 {
02705   unsigned int len = 0;
02706 
02707   // determine the consumer ID from the header request
02708   // message, if it is available.
02709   auto_ptr< vector<char> > httpPostData;
02710   unsigned int consumerId = 0;
02711   std::string lengthString = in->getenv("CONTENT_LENGTH");
02712   unsigned long contentLength = std::atol(lengthString.c_str());
02713   if (contentLength > 0) {
02714     auto_ptr< vector<char> > bufPtr(new vector<char>(contentLength));
02715     in->read(&(*bufPtr)[0], contentLength);
02716     OtherMessageView requestMessage(&(*bufPtr)[0]);
02717     if (requestMessage.code() == Header::HEADER_REQUEST)
02718     {
02719       uint8 *bodyPtr = requestMessage.msgBody();
02720       consumerId = convert32(bodyPtr);
02721     }
02722 
02723     // save the post data for use outside the "if" block scope in case it is
02724     // useful later (it will still get deleted at the end of the method)
02725     httpPostData = bufPtr;
02726   }
02727 
02728   // first test if StorageManager is in Enabled state and registry is filled
02729   // this must be the case for valid data to be present
02730   if(fsm_.stateName()->toString() == "Enabled" && jc_.get() != NULL &&
02731      jc_->getInitMsgCollection().get() != NULL &&
02732      jc_->getInitMsgCollection()->size() > 0)
02733     {
02734       std::string errorString;
02735       InitMsgSharedPtr serializedProds;
02736       boost::shared_ptr<EventServer> eventServer = jc_->getEventServer();
02737       if (eventServer.get() != NULL)
02738       {
02739         boost::shared_ptr<ConsumerPipe> consPtr =
02740           eventServer->getConsumer(consumerId);
02741         if (consPtr.get() != NULL)
02742         {
02743           // limit this (and other) interaction with the InitMsgCollection
02744           // to a single thread so that we can present a coherent
02745           // picture to consumers
02746           boost::mutex::scoped_lock sl(consumerInitMsgLock_);
02747           boost::shared_ptr<InitMsgCollection> initMsgCollection =
02748             jc_->getInitMsgCollection();
02749 
02750           try
02751           {
02752             if (consPtr->isProxyServer())
02753             {
02754               // If the INIT message collection has more than one element,
02755               // we build up a special response message that contains all
02756               // of the INIT messages in the collection (code = INIT_SET).
02757               // We can use an InitMsgBuffer to do this (and assign it
02758               // to the serializedProds local variable) because it
02759               // is really just a vector of char (it doesn't have any
02760               // internal structure that limits it to being used just for
02761               // single INIT messages).
02762               if (initMsgCollection->size() > 1)
02763               {
02764                 serializedProds = initMsgCollection->getFullCollection();
02765               }
02766               else
02767               {
02768                 serializedProds = initMsgCollection->getLastElement();
02769               }
02770             }
02771             else
02772             {
02773               std::string hltOMLabel = consPtr->getHLTOutputSelection();
02774               serializedProds =
02775                 initMsgCollection->getElementForOutputModule(hltOMLabel);
02776             }
02777             if (serializedProds.get() != NULL)
02778             {
02779               uint8* regPtr = &(*serializedProds)[0];
02780               HeaderView hdrView(regPtr);
02781 
02782               // if the response that we're sending is an INIT_SET rather
02783               // than a single INIT message, we simply use the first INIT
02784               // message in the collection to initialize the local 
02785               // ConsumerPipe.  Since all we need is the
02786               // full trigger list, any of the INIT messages should be fine
02787               // (because all of them should have the same full trigger list).
02788               if (hdrView.code() == Header::INIT_SET) {
02789                 OtherMessageView otherView(&(*serializedProds)[0]);
02790                 regPtr = otherView.msgBody();
02791               }
02792 
02793               Strings triggerNameList;
02794               InitMsgView initView(regPtr);
02795               initView.hltTriggerNames(triggerNameList);
02796 
02797               uint32 outputModuleId;
02798               if (initView.protocolVersion() >= 6) {
02799                 outputModuleId = initView.outputModuleId();
02800               }
02801               else {
02802                 std::string moduleLabel = initView.outputModuleLabel();
02803                 uLong crc = crc32(0L, Z_NULL, 0);
02804                 Bytef* crcbuf = (Bytef*) moduleLabel.data();
02805                 crc = crc32(crc, crcbuf, moduleLabel.length());
02806                 outputModuleId = static_cast<uint32>(crc);
02807               }
02808               consPtr->initializeSelection(triggerNameList,
02809                                            outputModuleId);
02810             }
02811           }
02812           catch (const edm::Exception& excpt)
02813           {
02814             errorString = excpt.what();
02815           }
02816           catch (const cms::Exception& excpt)
02817           {
02818             //errorString.append(excpt.what());
02819             errorString.append("ERROR: The configuration for this ");
02820             errorString.append("consumer does not specify an HLT output ");
02821             errorString.append("module.\nPlease specify one of the HLT ");
02822             errorString.append("output modules listed below as the ");
02823             errorString.append("SelectHLTOutput parameter ");
02824             errorString.append("in the InputSource configuration.\n");
02825             errorString.append(initMsgCollection->getSelectionHelpString());
02826             errorString.append("\n");
02827           }
02828         }
02829       }
02830       if (errorString.length() > 0) {
02831         len = errorString.length();
02832       }
02833       else if (serializedProds.get() != NULL) {
02834         len = serializedProds->size();
02835       }
02836       else {
02837         len = 0;
02838       }
02839       if (mybuffer_.capacity() < len) mybuffer_.resize(len);
02840       if (errorString.length() > 0) {
02841         const char *errorBytes = errorString.c_str();
02842         for (unsigned int i=0; i<len; ++i) mybuffer_[i]=errorBytes[i];
02843       }
02844       else if (serializedProds.get() != NULL) {
02845         for (unsigned int i=0; i<len; ++i) mybuffer_[i]=(*serializedProds)[i];
02846       }
02847     }
02848 
02849   out->getHTTPResponseHeader().addHeader("Content-Type", "application/octet-stream");
02850   out->getHTTPResponseHeader().addHeader("Content-Transfer-Encoding", "binary");
02851   out->write((char*) &mybuffer_[0],len);
02852   
02853   // How to block if there is no header data
02854   // How to signal if not yet started, so there is no registry yet?
02855 }
02856 
02857 void StorageManager::consumerListWebPage(xgi::Input *in, xgi::Output *out)
02858   throw (xgi::exception::Exception)
02859 {
02860   char buffer[65536];
02861 
02862   out->getHTTPResponseHeader().addHeader("Content-Type", "application/xml");
02863   sprintf(buffer,
02864     "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"iso-8859-1\"?>\n<Monitor>\n");
02865   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02866 
02867   if(fsm_.stateName()->toString() == "Enabled")
02868   {
02869     sprintf(buffer, "<ConsumerList>\n");
02870     out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02871 
02872     boost::shared_ptr<EventServer> eventServer;
02873     if (jc_.get() != NULL)
02874     {
02875       eventServer = jc_->getEventServer();
02876     }
02877     if (eventServer.get() != NULL)
02878     {
02879       std::map< uint32, boost::shared_ptr<ConsumerPipe> > consumerTable = 
02880   eventServer->getConsumerTable();
02881       std::map< uint32, boost::shared_ptr<ConsumerPipe> >::const_iterator 
02882   consumerIter;
02883       for (consumerIter = consumerTable.begin();
02884      consumerIter != consumerTable.end();
02885      ++consumerIter)
02886       {
02887   boost::shared_ptr<ConsumerPipe> consumerPipe = consumerIter->second;
02888   sprintf(buffer, "<Consumer>\n");
02889   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02890 
02891   if (consumerPipe->isProxyServer()) {
02892     sprintf(buffer, "<Name>Proxy Server</Name>\n");
02893   }
02894   else {
02895     sprintf(buffer, "<Name>%s</Name>\n",
02896             consumerPipe->getConsumerName().c_str());
02897   }
02898   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02899 
02900   sprintf(buffer, "<ID>%d</ID>\n", consumerPipe->getConsumerId());
02901   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02902 
02903   sprintf(buffer, "<Time>%d</Time>\n", 
02904     (int)consumerPipe->getLastEventRequestTime());
02905   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02906 
02907   sprintf(buffer, "<Host>%s</Host>\n", 
02908     consumerPipe->getHostName().c_str());
02909   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02910 
02911   sprintf(buffer, "<Events>%d</Events>\n", consumerPipe->getEvents());
02912   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02913 
02914   sprintf(buffer, "<Failed>%d</Failed>\n", 
02915     consumerPipe->getPushEventFailures());
02916   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02917 
02918   sprintf(buffer, "<Idle>%d</Idle>\n", consumerPipe->isIdle());
02919   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02920 
02921   sprintf(buffer, "<Disconnected>%d</Disconnected>\n", 
02922     consumerPipe->isDisconnected());
02923   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02924 
02925   sprintf(buffer, "<Ready>%d</Ready>\n", consumerPipe->isReadyForEvent());
02926   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02927 
02928   sprintf(buffer, "</Consumer>\n");
02929   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02930       }
02931     }
02932     boost::shared_ptr<DQMEventServer> dqmServer;
02933     if (jc_.get() != NULL)
02934     {
02935       dqmServer = jc_->getDQMEventServer();
02936     }
02937     if (dqmServer.get() != NULL)
02938     {
02939       std::map< uint32, boost::shared_ptr<DQMConsumerPipe> > dqmTable = 
02940   dqmServer->getConsumerTable();
02941       std::map< uint32, boost::shared_ptr<DQMConsumerPipe> >::const_iterator 
02942   dqmIter;
02943       for (dqmIter = dqmTable.begin();
02944      dqmIter != dqmTable.end();
02945      ++dqmIter)
02946       {
02947   boost::shared_ptr<DQMConsumerPipe> dqmPipe = dqmIter->second;
02948   sprintf(buffer, "<DQMConsumer>\n");
02949   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02950 
02951   if (dqmPipe->isProxyServer()) {
02952     sprintf(buffer, "<Name>Proxy Server</Name>\n");
02953   }
02954   else {
02955     sprintf(buffer, "<Name>%s</Name>\n",
02956             dqmPipe->getConsumerName().c_str());
02957   }
02958   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02959 
02960   sprintf(buffer, "<ID>%d</ID>\n", dqmPipe->getConsumerId());
02961   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02962 
02963   sprintf(buffer, "<Time>%d</Time>\n", 
02964     (int)dqmPipe->getLastEventRequestTime());
02965   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02966 
02967   sprintf(buffer, "<Host>%s</Host>\n", 
02968     dqmPipe->getHostName().c_str());
02969   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02970 
02971   sprintf(buffer, "<Events>%d</Events>\n", dqmPipe->getEvents());
02972   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02973 
02974   sprintf(buffer, "<Failed>%d</Failed>\n", 
02975     dqmPipe->getPushEventFailures());
02976   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02977 
02978   sprintf(buffer, "<Idle>%d</Idle>\n", dqmPipe->isIdle());
02979   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02980 
02981   sprintf(buffer, "<Disconnected>%d</Disconnected>\n", 
02982     dqmPipe->isDisconnected());
02983   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02984 
02985   sprintf(buffer, "<Ready>%d</Ready>\n", dqmPipe->isReadyForEvent());
02986   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02987 
02988   sprintf(buffer, "</DQMConsumer>\n");
02989   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02990       }
02991     }
02992     sprintf(buffer, "</ConsumerList>\n");
02993     out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02994   }
02995   sprintf(buffer, "</Monitor>");
02996   out->write(buffer,strlen(buffer));
02997 }
02998 
03000 void StorageManager::eventServerWebPage(xgi::Input *in, xgi::Output *out)
03001   throw (xgi::exception::Exception)
03002 {
03003   // We should make the HTML header and the page banner common
03004   std::string url =
03005     getApplicationDescriptor()->getContextDescriptor()->getURL();
03006   std::string urn = getApplicationDescriptor()->getURN();
03007 
03008   // determine whether we're automatically updating the page
03009   // --> if the SM is not enabled, assume that users want updating turned
03010   // --> ON so that they don't A) think that is is ON (when it's not) and
03011   // --> B) wait forever thinking that something is wrong.
03012   //bool autoUpdate = true;
03013   // 11-Jun-2008, KAB - changed auto update default to OFF
03014   bool autoUpdate = false;
03015   if(fsm_.stateName()->toString() == "Enabled") {
03016     cgicc::Cgicc cgiWrapper(in);
03017     cgicc::const_form_iterator updateRef = cgiWrapper.getElement("update");
03018     if (updateRef != cgiWrapper.getElements().end()) {
03019       std::string updateString =
03020         boost::algorithm::to_lower_copy(updateRef->getValue());
03021       if (updateString == "off") {
03022         autoUpdate = false;
03023       }
03024       else {
03025         autoUpdate = true;
03026       }
03027     }
03028   }
03029 
03030   *out << "<html>" << std::endl;
03031   *out << "<head>" << std::endl;
03032   if (autoUpdate) {
03033     *out << "<meta http-equiv=\"refresh\" content=\"10\">" << std::endl;
03034   }
03035   *out << "<link type=\"text/css\" rel=\"stylesheet\"";
03036   *out << " href=\"/" << urn << "/styles.css\"/>" << std::endl;
03037   *out << "<title>" << getApplicationDescriptor()->getClassName()
03038        << " Instance " << getApplicationDescriptor()->getInstance()
03039        << "</title>" << std::endl;
03040   *out << "<style type=\"text/css\">" << std::endl;
03041   *out << "  .noBotMarg {margin-bottom:0px;}" << std::endl;
03042   *out << "</style>" << std::endl;
03043   *out << "</head><body>" << std::endl;
03044 
03045   *out << "<table border=\"1\" width=\"100%\">"                      << endl;
03046   *out << "<tr>"                                                     << endl;
03047   *out << "  <td align=\"left\">"                                    << endl;
03048   *out << "    <img"                                                 << endl;
03049   *out << "     align=\"middle\""                                    << endl;
03050   *out << "     src=\"/evf/images/smicon.jpg\""                      << endl;
03051   *out << "     alt=\"main\""                                        << endl;

03510           eventSum += eventServer->getEventCount(EventServer::LONG_TERM_STATS,
03511                                                  EventServer::OUTPUT_STATS,
03512                                                  outputModuleId, now);
03513           eventRateSum += eventServer->getEventRate(EventServer::LONG_TERM_STATS,
03514                                                     EventServer::OUTPUT_STATS,
03515                                                     outputModuleId, now);
03516           dataRateSum += eventServer->getDataRate(EventServer::LONG_TERM_STATS,
03517                                                   EventServer::OUTPUT_STATS,
03518                                                   outputModuleId, now);
03519 
03520           *out << "<tr>" << std::endl;
03521           *out << "  <td align=\"center\">" << initView.outputModuleLabel()
03522                << "</td>" << std::endl;
03523           *out << "  <td align=\"center\">"
03524                << eventServer->getEventCount(EventServer::LONG_TERM_STATS,
03525                                              EventServer::OUTPUT_STATS,
03526                                              outputModuleId, now)
03527                << "</td>" << std::endl;
03528           *out << "  <td align=\"center\">"
03529                << eventServer->getEventRate(EventServer::LONG_TERM_STATS,
03530                                             EventServer::OUTPUT_STATS,
03531                                             outputModuleId, now)
03532                << "</td>" << std::endl;

03535                                            EventServer::OUTPUT_STATS,
03536                                            outputModuleId, now)
03537                << "</td>" << std::endl;

03540                                            EventServer::OUTPUT_STATS,

03542                << "</td>" << std::endl;

03626         *out << "<h3>Consumers:</h3>" << std::endl;
03627         std::map< uint32, boost::shared_ptr<ConsumerPipe> > consumerTable = 
03628           eventServer->getConsumerTable();
03629         if (consumerTable.size() == 0)
03630         {
03631           *out << "No consumers are currently registered with "
03632                << "this Storage Manager instance.<br/>" << std::endl;
03633         }
03634         else
03635         {
03636           std::map< uint32, boost::shared_ptr<ConsumerPipe> >::const_iterator 
03637             consumerIter;
03638 
03639           // ************************************************************
03640           // * Consumer summary table
03641           // ************************************************************
03642           *out << "<h4>Summary:</h4>" << std::endl;

03645           *out << "  <th>ID</th>" << std::endl;

03650           *out << "  <th>Trigger<br/>Request</th>" << std::endl;
03651           *out << "</tr>" << std::endl;
03652 
03653           for (consumerIter = consumerTable.begin();
03654                consumerIter != consumerTable.end();
03655                ++consumerIter)
03656           {
03657             boost::shared_ptr<ConsumerPipe> consPtr = consumerIter->second;
03658             *out << "<tr>" << std::endl;
03659             *out << "  <td align=\"center\">" << consPtr->getConsumerId()
03660                  << "</td>" << std::endl;
03661 
03662             *out << "  <td align=\"center\">";
03663             if (consPtr->isProxyServer()) {
03664               *out << "Proxy Server";
03665             }
03666             else {
03667               *out << consPtr->getConsumerName();
03668             }
03669             *out << "</td>" << std::endl;
03670 
03671             *out << "  <td align=\"center\">";
03672             if (consPtr->isDisconnected()) {
03673               *out << "Disconnected";
03674             }
03675             else if (consPtr->isIdle()) {
03676               *out << "Idle";
03677             }
03678             else {
03679               *out << "Active";
03680             }
03681             *out << "</td>" << std::endl;
03682

03684                  << " Hz</td>" << std::endl;

03686               *out << "  <td align=\"center\">&lt;all&gt;</td>" << std::endl;
03687             }
03688             else {
03689               std::string hltOut = consPtr->getHLTOutputSelection();
03690               if (hltOut.empty()) {
03691                 *out << "  <td align=\"center\">&lt;none&gt;</td>" << std::endl;
03692               }
03693               else {
03694                 *out << "  <td align=\"center\">" << hltOut
03695                      << "</td>" << std::endl;
03696               }
03697             }
03698             *out << "  <td align=\"center\">"
03699                  << InitMsgCollection::stringsToText(consPtr->getTriggerSelection(), 5)
03700                  << "</td>" << std::endl;
03701 
03702             *out << "</tr>" << std::endl;
03703           }
03704           *out << "</table>" << std::endl;
